text: Hi Tyler. Nice to meet you! I hope I can be of some help. I'm here during office hours so feel free to come and chat any time between 9:30am and 6pm. Of course if there's anything you want to ask outside those hours then that's fine, and I'll get back to you as soon as I can.
Hi Christian. Likewise! Thanks for offering your time to help out, hope everything is going well with you.

I am currently in my final year of uni at Arts University Bournemouth and am currently in the stages of putting together my showreel. As well as meeting others in the industry, one of the reaons of signing up to a mentorship was to get some tips and feedback on work I have done, if thats okay with you. Theres lots to do yet but any feedback on the way is of value.
